channel.title: 这次Zen2的内存延迟简直神级——存疑
channel.description: 这次Zen2的内存延迟简直神级——存疑

item.title: 这次Zen2的内存延迟简直神级——存疑[0-50]
item.description:
这次Zen2的内存延迟简直神级——存疑 本帖最后由 雪影 于 2019-5-31 15:46 编辑
先上链接：https://wccftech.com/amd-ryzen-3 ... ghz-all-core-boost/
此链接消息源疑似CHH出口转内销The overclocking details come straight from Chiphell where forum member ‘One Month’, the same guy responsible for showing us the first look at the Ryzen 3000 APUs has given us the overclocking details for Ryzen 3000 CPUs. The new details are rounded up over at Reddit so let’s take a look at them before heading into details.
4.8GHz is achievable on all cores
~4.4GHz performs similar to a 5Ghz 9900k – in Cinebench
5.0GHz is doable, but it’s a challenge
Overclock for overclocking, Ryzen 3000 is still faster
5GHz boost isn’t infeasible
5Ghz all core is pretty much a no-go.
1.35V for all core 4.5Ghz
Memory is being run very loose and slow to assure the stability for testing
39ns，比intel都低
https://cdn.wccftech.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/AMD-Ryzen-3000-AIDA64-Memory-Benchmark-1030x1002.jpeg
CHH随便找了张9900K-4111的来比
https://static.chiphell.com/forum/201811/25/180440i0yam4hlw01lfk2m.jpg
item.content:encoded:
雪影:
这次Zen2的内存延迟简直神级——存疑
本帖最后由 雪影 于 2019-5-31 15:46 编辑
先上链接：https://wccftech.com/amd-ryzen-3 ... ghz-all-core-boost/
此链接消息源疑似CHH出口转内销The overclocking details come straight from Chiphell where forum member ‘One Month’, the same guy responsible for showing us the first look at the Ryzen 3000 APUs has given us the overclocking details for Ryzen 3000 CPUs. The new details are rounded up over at Reddit so let’s take a look at them before heading into details.
4.8GHz is achievable on all cores
~4.4GHz performs similar to a 5Ghz 9900k – in Cinebench
5.0GHz is doable, but it’s a challenge
Overclock for overclocking, Ryzen 3000 is still faster
5GHz boost isn’t infeasible
5Ghz all core is pretty much a no-go.
1.35V for all core 4.5Ghz
Memory is being run very loose and slow to assure the stability for testing
39ns，比intel都低

CHH随便找了张9900K-4111的来比

847681220:
p得真烂缓存比zen1还倒退

失身招领处:
847681220 发表于 2019-5-31 14:37
p得真烂缓存比zen1还倒退
那图不是9900K的吗？

creymorgan:
缓存一看就知道有问题了吧，从l1l2来看，这是一个6核处理器跑出来的，我猜测是8700k。

红左手:
你怎么不说CHH的帖子下面还说那张模糊的图是PS的？

奶绷子:
PS的
